name: Mortick's Brace
flavorText: These ancient bracers belonged to the barbarian berserker Mortick, who believed them to be lucky and never took them off. When at last he died, his tribesmen discovered he had stitched them into his flesh.
flavorTextHtml: These ancient bracers belonged to the barbarian berserker Mortick, who believed them to be lucky and never took them off. When at last he died, his tribesmen discovered he had stitched them into his flesh.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Wrath of the Berserker gains the effect of every rune. (Barbarian Only)
secondary.text: Wrath of the Berserker gains the effect of every rune. (Barbarian Only)
